mapper.insert: insert into t_springmvc_car ( brand, series, price, licensing_time, level, gearbox, output_v, mileage, location, pic, summary, create_time ) values( #{brand}, #{series}, #{price}, #{licensingTime}, #{level}, #{gearbox}, #{outputV}, #{mileage}, #{location}, #{pic}, #{summary}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select brand from t_springmvc_car group by brand

select series from t_springmvc_car
brand = #{brand}
group by series
limit 5
